basics.label: Bartender / Server Trainer / Banquet Event Captain
basics.summary: Seeking a position with a company dedicated to growth, as well as; acknowledgment of extraordinary efforts/achievements. I am a results driven individual with a professional work ethic and verifiable sales and sales management experience. I possess excellent interpersonal, communication and relationship-building skills; can listen attentively, communicate persuasively and follow through diligently. I consider myself a leader, striving to achieve continuous success in all facets of business, sales, and management; while simultaneously providing the means for my team to also reach exponential success.

work.position: Bartender / Server Trainer / Banquet Event Captain
work.summary: Interacting with guests, fellow workers and supervisors in a polite, considerate, and welcoming manner to make sure all guests have a perfect bar experience. Uphold company standards by executing steps of service flawlessly to maximize level of hospitality for guests and profitability for the company.

Office administration work in addition to upholding the structure of advertising and recruiting. Assisted in hiring and training all sales staff for new Branch Office location. Led sales calls with team members to establish sales and customer retention goals.

Operate as an independent contractor selling CUTCO high-quality cutlery and culinary products. Emphasized product features based on analysis of customers' needs. Scheduled an average of 20+ appointments during sales pushes.
